item.title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
item.description:
Title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
Genre: Action
Developer: SNK CORPORATION
Publisher: SNK CORPORATION
Franchise: FATAL FURY
Release Date: Apr 21, 2025




About This Game

SNK’s beloved Fatal Fury series first hit the market in 1991, spearheading the fighting game boom of the 1990s that swept the industry thereafter. GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES (released in 1999) has, for some time, served as the franchise’s most recent installment. But that is all about to change: 26 years on, a brand-new entry—FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves—is set to arrive on the scene!

■All-new REV System supercharges the excitement!

Introducing the REV System, a brand-new toolset that offers unique offensive options from the moment the battle begins! Use REV Arts, REV Accel, REV Blows (while S.P.G. is active), and more until you hit your limit and the REV Meter overheats. The all-new REV System—fight at full throttle and supercharge the excitement!

■Two control schemes—fun for newcomers and veterans alike!
Choose from two control schemes: Arcade Style is based on precise, technical inputs, while Smart Style lets you perform flashy special moves and combos using directional inputs and single button presses. From fighting game newcomers to seasoned veterans, there’s plenty of fun and excitement to be had—tailored specifically to your level!

■Memorable fighters from far and wide descend on the streets of South Town!

The action kicks off with a total of 22 characters: a diverse 17-member roster of familiar faces and new blood, plus five DLC fighters in Season Pass 1. Every character is vibrantly presented in CotW's unique art style, which is guaranteed to stimulate the senses.

■Strive for supremacy in EPISODES OF SOUTH TOWN, a single-player RPG mode!
Introducing “Episodes of South Town” (EOST)—a solo RPG adventure where you’ll square up against contenders under various fight conditions, earning XP and other rewards for your efforts. Level up your fighter, build out a diverse kit of skills, and dominate the opposition on your way to the top. Dreams and ambitions run rampant in South Town; now is the time to chase the city’s crown and carve a legend all of your own!

* To play EOST you’ll first need to connect to the Internet and update the game.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1060 (VRAM 6GB) / Radeon RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX2070 / Radeon RX 5700XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description:
Title: Tower Unite
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , Racing
Developer: PixelTail Games
Publisher: PixelTail Games
Release Date: Apr 19, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 8, 2016




About This Game

Tower Unite is a living, evolving world, fueled by the community. Play online games with your friends or make new friends from around the world!

Tower Unite is a large online multiplayer game that spans several genres.

  • Play fully featured minigames such as Minigolf, Accelerate, Ball Race, Virus, Zombie Massacre, and more!

  • Hang out and enjoy various games at the virtual theme park filled with activities and games called the Plaza!

  • Play over 30 unique Arcade games with multiplayer support!

  • Build unique creations and share your creativity with your friends!

  • Customize yourself with accessories and Workshop player models

  • Party with friends!

  • Create custom models and import them directly to the game with Steam Workshop

  • Create custom levels to share and play

  • Earn over 3,000 unique & interactive items

  • Watch synchronized media from YouTube and Soundcloud

  • Play Emulators & create custom arcades with Libretro built-in

  • Rank up and earn achievements and items

  • Suggest new features - we listen!

  • No microtransactions or subscription fees. Every content update is free

  • We're constantly updating the game with new features and content

DO MORE THAN OTHER VIRTUAL WORLD GAMES

Tower Unite isn't just a walk-around-and-chat simulator. You can run, jump, crouch, use jetpacks, get drunk, dance, sit, throw-up, lounge in pool tubes, drive vehicles and much much more.

Tower Unite has many games to play, with more to come, such as...

  • Online multiplayer minigolf with up to 16 players

  • 13 courses with 18 holes (234 holes total) and more in the works!

  • Based on the original 2009 minigolf hit from GMod Tower that inspired many minigolf games

  • Unique controls (100% skill, no timers)

  • Hole-in-one fireworks!

  • Wear tiny hats & glasses on your golf ball

  • Putt through a dinosaur land, candy land, computers, snowy mountains, gardens, pirate ships, skies, and even space!

  • Simultaneous putting (everyone putts at once!)

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer FPS arena shooter with up to 12 players

  • 30+ unique weapons to blast opponents with

  • 5 arena levels, with more in the works!

  • Various gametypes such as CTF, Team Deathmatch, Instagib, Dino Battle, and more!

  • Play as any character using Steam Workshop

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer Kart racer with up to 10 players

  • 14 unique items to knock out the competition with

  • 8 scenic tracks to speed through, with more in the works!

  • Play as any character using Steam Workshop

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer ball racing with up to 16 players

  • 12 unique worlds and more in the works!

  • Speed roll around in a giant ball

  • Carefully maneuver around tricky obstacles

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Up to 8 players online

  • 7 unique levels and more in the works!

  • Thrilling 1 vs All gameplay

  • Become the Dragon and devour the knights

  • Attempt turn off the rampaging Dragon as one of the knights

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer top down shooter with up to 6 players

  • 6 unique levels and more in the works!

  • Co-operative shooting action

  • Survive waves of zombies and monsters

  • 6 unique character classes with their own powerful abilities

  • 32 overpowered zombie massacring weapons

  • Boss battles

  • Single player mode available

  • Player hosted servers

  • Online multiplayer FPS with up to 12 players

  • 7 unique levels to survive the inevitable infection in and more in the works!

  • Fast paced old school first person shooting action

  • Blast infected away with 10 high-tech sci-fi weapons

  • Team tag elimination, with weapons

  • Player hosted servers

Hang out and enjoy various games at the Plaza! The Plaza is a massive place filled with activities and games that can all be enjoyed in one place. It's like a virtual theme park filled with multiplayer games. Everything in the Plaza is multiplayer so you can participate with all the activities with your friends or make new friends!

The Plaza features many activities such as:

  • Arcade - Play over 30 fully featured multiplayer Arcade games and win tickets and prizes

  • Boardwalk Games - Play various carnival games such as Bumper Cars, Water Blasters, Roll & Race, and more with friends!

  • Nightclub - Listen to music with Soundcloud and YouTube support. Enjoy billiards and bar drinks as well!

  • Casino - Gamble with players at slot machines, horse betting, roulette, bingo, blackjack, video poker, video blackjack, spin-to-win, texas hold'em, and five card draw

  • Fishing - Fish up over 100 unique fish in a unique fishing minigame

  • Bowling - Bowl with friends and enjoy media at the same time

  • Laser Tag - Play fast-paced team laser tag

  • Trivia - Answer various up-to-date questions submitted by our community

  • Theater - Watch synchronized YouTube or SoundCloud

  • Typing Derby - Type as quickly as you can and race to the finish

  • Boardwalk Rides - Ride a rollercoaster or relax and catch the views on a ferris wheel with your friends

  • Dark Ride - Ride a spooky dark ride and blast away ghouls and ghosts with friends on the Dark Voyage

  • Minigames & Events - Participate in dozens of quick minigames such as Balloon Shoot, Plane Wars, and more!

  • Seasonal Events such as Summer, Halloween, Easter, and Winter Holidays - Collect limited time items and celebrate various holidays.

  • Unlock items at in-game stores - Unlock thousands of new items at 30 different in-game stores

Build unique creations and share your creativity with your friends! Easily display images from the internet and import custom models. Customize wallpapers, lights, time of day, and weather to set the perfect mood. Enjoy sync'd YouTube videos and music from SoundCloud. Interact with over 3000 unique items, such as playable pianos and basketball.

  • Place and scale tons of different furniture and items in any arrangement you desire

  • Display images from the internet directly in the game (synced with online players)

  • Build unique and vast creations

  • Customize wallpapers, lights, time of day, and weather

  • Invite friends to party, chat, voice chat, drink, and eat virtual pizza!

  • Watch synchronized media such as YouTube and SoundCloud

  • Build and share Condos with your friends!

  • Play instruments like a piano, drums, or guitar with full MIDI support

  • Interact with over a thousand various weird and cool items

  • Get a pet cat, dog, fish, or w a t e r m e l o n

  • Import your own furniture through modding tools and full Workshop support

  • Play multiplayer games of various genres online with friends

  • Play online Minigolf with up to 16 players

  • Play online kart racing with up to 10 players

  • Create custom models and import them directly to the game with Steam Workshop

  • Customize yourself with lots of accessories

  • Dance at a Nightclub with billiard tables and synchronized visualizers

  • Furnish and design your own home with furniture, interactive toys, and modding support

  • Invite other players over to your Condo for parties and mini-games

  • Watch synchronized YouTube videos or Soundcloud music in a virtual theater or your personal Condo

  • Fly around in jetpacks

  • Create or play custom levels

  • Join official servers or host your own server

  • Play Emulators & create custom arcades with Libretro built-in

  • Hang out with your friends or find new friends!

  • Enjoy free updates, no microtransactions, and developer support

  • Collect tons of unique items with Steam Inventory support

Game featured in screenshots: DUCKSTROMA by AB-UltraNarwhal

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit)
    • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX10 Compatible GPU with 2 GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    • VR Support: SteamVR
    • Additional Notes: Integrated graphic cards will have trouble running the game. Disk space will increase over time due to new content added.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 32 GB available space

item.title: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
item.description:
Title: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
Genre: RPG
Developer: Xso
Publisher: Xso
Release Date: Apr 19, 2025




About This Game

Story

You’re entering your junior year of college. Your first two years went by quickly— You were an average college student, living an average college life. However, after almost getting hit by a car, you meet a mysterious woman who says you’ll die if you don’t find your soulmate soon! Now you have to juggle school, work, and your impending doom?!

Fate works in mysterious ways. You bump into your childhood best friend who you haven’t seen in years. Your friend’s sister takes a keen interest in you. The senior you occasionally bump into helps you get an internship. And even the CEO at your new job seems to have her eyes on you…

Who will be your soulmate, and who holds a hidden vendetta against you? In this twisted, passionate game of emotions, what will come to light? Love, possessiveness, manipulation, and obsession swirl together… Will you discover the truth behind it all?

Characters

Selene Yan (*First name can be customized)

A junior at Ocean City University. You’re a soft and sweet person with a big heart who’s always willing to stand up for what they believe in. Kind and empathetic, your caring nature is adored by those around you.

Nyx Xia
Your childhood best friend. You two previously had an arranged marriage, but that fell through pretty quickly. You ended up moving away and not seeing her for years. She’s changed— She’s bubbly and energetic, but sometimes grim… Maybe there’s more to her than the eye can see.

Iris Wen
The student council president. She’s a year above you and about to graduate. Iris helps you with an internship opportunity. She’s nice and friendly, but don’t be fooled— her gentle nature is simply a façade. She struggles to let anyone in, keeping her heart locked up in a cage. Perhaps there’s a hidden side to her she’s keeping a secret…

Eleanor Si

She’s your classmate from another university, and the twin sister of your friend. Eleanor’s always eager to learn more, so she’s agreed to attending lectures in place of her sister. She’s been interested in you since the day you two met.

Victoria Qi

The CEO of Huanyu. She’s a genius who graduated with dual degrees. Victoria pays extra close attention to you, making sure you’re thriving at work. She’s strict and dedicated to her job, often appearing impersonal to others.

Details

Love Curse is a lesbian visual novel spanning across a variety of genres, including romance, fantasy, and historical elements.

The final version of the game will be paid. The storyline will span over approximately 200,000 words, with over 40 exclusive CGs (chibi versions included), 4 romanceable characters, and 7 supporting characters (all female).

More Information

1. The romanceable characters are not perfect. They each have obvious negative personality traits which will be revealed during the game.

2. The game may contain a few bugs. These can be reported to the production team via “Option.”

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Bad Ending routes will include character death, depictions of blood, toxic characters, imprisonment, secret love affairs, and additional material that might be disturbing to some players.



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Lost Skies
item.description:
Title: Lost Skies
Genre: Action , Adventure , Early Access
Developer: Bossa Studios
Publisher: Humble Games
Franchise: Humble Games , Lost Skies
Release Date: Apr 18, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 18, 2025




About This Game

Embark on a high-flying journey through the remnants of ancient civilizations and uncover the mysteries behind their downfall. As you traverse skies teeming with wonder and danger, harness advanced technology to overcome challenges and push the boundaries of human ingenuity.


You’ll need to explore ancient ruins and utilize Atlas, the mysterious power that keeps the world afloat, to solve puzzles and discover the precious technology left behind by those who came before. However, danger lurks around every corner on both land and in the air. Fight against the ancient turrets and drones that hunt you across the floating islands, and engage in epic sky battles with colossal beings that have been roaming the skies since they brought about humanity's destruction.


In this vast, open world, your journey will be defined by the skyship you create. This isn’t just your vessel, it’s your home and your weapon. With Lost Skies’ deep ship crafting system, you can place parts freely to construct a flying fortress that’s as unique as your imagination. You’ll need to balance durability, agility, and firepower as you tailor your ship to face the challenges ahead. No two skyships are the same, so let your creativity take flight!

Why just fly when you can glide, grapple, and climb your way through the skies? Scale sharp cliff faces or traverse the floating islands of Lost Skies with a physics-based grappling hook, hang glider, and wingsuit that makes every leap and bound exhilarating. Explore seamlessly, moving freely between distant horizons and breathtaking landmarks. This world isn’t just beautiful, it’s yours to conquer, one daring move at a time.

Let your imagination run wild with Lost Skies’ intuitive Island Creator. Design and build custom islands, then share them with the community through the Steam Workshop. Download and explore other players’ creations to expand your adventure. The skies are limitless, and so is the creativity of its explorers.

Join the Discord to join the active Lost Skies community filled with creative visionaries and eager explorers who are helping to shape the future of the game!



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.3 GHz boost) AMD Ryzen 3 3100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 3.9 GHz boost)
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 590
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Notes: CPU (Processor) • At least 4 physical cores • Base Clock: ~2.4–3.0 GHz • Boost Clock: ~3.5–4.0 GHz • Intel Examples (modern 4C/8T or stronger): - Intel Core i3-10100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.3 GHz boost) - Intel Core i5-7500 (4C/4T, 3.4 GHz base, up to 3.8 GHz boost) [older, but closer to Deck than i5-6400] • AMD Examples (4C/8T or stronger): - AMD Ryzen 3 3100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 3.9 GHz boost) - AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (4C/8T, 3.2 GHz base, up to 3.4 GHz boost) [older Zen1, but has 8 threads] GPU (Graphics Card) • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 590 Memory (RAM) • Minimum: 6 GB Storage • 20 GB of available HDD space (SSD strongly recommended)
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 (8C/16T, 2.9 GHz base, up to 4.8 GHz boost) AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8C/16T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.4 GHz boost)
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT (6 GB VRAM) or RX Vega 56 (8 GB HBM2)
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: CPU (Processor) • ~8 cores, ~3.4–3.6 GHz base, 4.0+ GHz boost (Comparable to Xbox Series S) • Intel Example: - Intel Core i7-10700 (8C/16T, 2.9 GHz base, up to 4.8 GHz boost) • AMD Example: - AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8C/16T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.4 GHz boost) GPU (Graphics Card) • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) • AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT (6 GB VRAM) or RX Vega 56 (8 GB HBM2) Memory (RAM) • Recommended: 16 GB Storage • 20 GB of available HDD space (SSD strongly recommended) Operating System • Windows 10 (64-bit) or later

item.title: Sunset Motel
item.description:
Title: Sunset Motel
Genre: Action , Casual , Simulation
Developer: Efkey Studios
Publisher: RockGame S.A.
Franchise: RockGame S.A.
Release Date: Apr 18, 2025




About This Game

Step into the enchanting embrace of the Sunset Motel! A haven that caresses weary souls, and encourages travelers to pause and unwind. In this one-of-a-kind simulation experience, start on a journey to breathe life into dilapidated rooms and ensure the radiant smiles of your cherished guests.

Building on Guest Satisfaction:

Experience the stunning transformation of Sunset Motel's rooms! Use vibrant colors on walls, lay new tiles, and adorned with stylish furnishings for unparalleled guest comfort and blissful peace of mind.

Use Your Own Creativity:

Welcome to your motel! This game offers complete freedom in creating a unique space. You decide on every detail. The design of rooms, entertainment areas, and even the pool - all depends on your creativity. Take control and craft a motel that reflects only your unique visions!

Manage your motel:

The success of your motel is measured by the smiles of your guests. As a savvy business owner, skillfully manage your team to ensure the happiness of every customer. Let your motel shine like a star in the hospitality universe, creating a haven where satisfaction is the brightest constellation.

Entertainment and Recreation Facilities:

No more boredom in your motel! Craft your own vibrant entertainment spaces and a refreshing pool. Design areas where your guests can unwind, have fun and create unforgettable memories. Your motel, their playground – let the excitement begin!

Create a place where your travelers are comfortable and want to return every time. At Motel Kingdom, we believe that there is a place where everyone can relax and have fun.

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Our game leverages generative AI during development to create visually rich and immersive environments, character designs, and narrative elements. AI tools have been used to assist in crafting unique pre-rendered assets, such as artwork and animations, ensuring a high-quality experience while adhering to copyright and ethical guidelines.

However, the game does not use AI to generate live content or code during gameplay. All in-game interactions and mechanics are pre-designed and curated by our team, ensuring a consistent and controlled gaming experience.

By incorporating AI responsibly, we aim to deliver a creative and engaging experience while maintaining transparency and safeguarding user trust.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1st gen / Intel Core i5 7th gen
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3rd gen / Intel Core i5 10th gen
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA RTX 2070 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
